---
title: Dry matter response in ALFAM2 model
author: Sasha D. Hafner
output: pdf_document
date: January 2021
---

```{r}
rm(list = ls())
library(ALFAM2)
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
source('../../functions/rounddf.R')
```

Get, tweak pars

```{r}
load('../../parameters/parf.RData')
pars <- parf
pars['man.ph.r1'] <- 0.66
pars['man.ph.r3'] <- 0.24
```

Input data.

```{r}
dat <- data.frame(ct = 168, man.dm = 1:150/10,
                  TAN.app = 100)
dat$id <- 1:nrow(dat)
```

Run model.

```{r}
pred1 <- ALFAM2mod(dat, group = 'id')
pred2 <- ALFAM2mod(dat, pars = pars, group = 'id')
```

```{r}
plot(dat$man.dm, pred1$er, type = 'l', ylim = c(0.1, 0.4))
lines(dat$man.dm, pred2$er, col = 'red')
```
